definition: to resign/to dismiss/to decline/to take leave/ballad (archaic poetic genre)/variant of 詞|词[ci2]

sentences.english: I commanded him to take the mission seriously.
sentences.chinese: 我嚴辭請求店家認真對待這個任務。

sentences.english: South Korea responded with its own harsh rhetoric, asking Tokyo to withdraw the boycott.
sentences.chinese: 韓國對此做出了嚴辭迴應，要求日本撤銷抵制。

sentences.english: The churches and newspapers fulminated against the crime wave.
sentences.chinese: 教會和報紙嚴辭譴責猖獗的犯罪。

sentences.english: Yoshimasa severe tongue-lashing to refuse him, and warned him not to dwell on you.
sentences.chinese: 義正嚴辭拒絕了他，並警告他不要糾纏於你。
